name: Gala Reef
description: Experience the vibrant underwater world with our guided snorkeling tours at Gala Reef. Perfect for beginners and seasoned snorkelers alike.

name: Dawson's Reef
description: Dive into adventure with our scuba diving excursions at Dawson's Reef. Explore colorful coral formations and diverse marine life with certified instructors.

name: Claire's Reef
description: Join us for an unforgettable snorkeling experience at Claire's Reef. Swim alongside tropical fish and marvel at the stunning coral gardens.
